channel.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Source Download v2.0.3.1: http://up.ht/mLPlim Exe Download v2.0.3.1: http://up.ht/lkx9J3[/b][/size]
[b]Source Download v1.8.2.2: http://up.ht/jnPfxM Exe. Download v1.8.2.2: http://up.ht/jDCRBK[/b]
[size=14pt][b]I DEFINATELY SUGGEST DOWNlOADING! EXTREMELY FUN!!!![/b][/size]
[b]Story Line:[/b] (Not yet included in the source) The scientists who created the downfall of man have created a new universal weapon. To test it they are sending you into a specalized test room where thay can filter how many zombies are let in. Be weary for they are also testing it on Varigaunts wich will appear every 5 waves... How long can you survive?
[b]Introduction:[/b] Zombie arcadium is a DOA(Dead Ops Arcade) inspired game. In zombie arcadium you are given a universal weapon in which can shoot 10 different types of bullets. Every 5 rounds when you kill the mighty Varigaunt a different weapon upgrade will drop. (So far there are only 2 upgrades but you will recieve nukes if you get the upgrade again.) As each wave progresses there are more and more zombies and they are harder to kill. What the game lacks in graphics at the moment is made up by game play.
[b]Credits:[/b] I am currently the only developer working on this Sounds - CoD Zombies WAW Graphics - Me & Unreal Software
[b]Controlls:[/b] WASD - Movement Mouse - Aim Left Mouse Button - Shoot Space - Pause Shift - Nuke
[b]Development Progress:[/b] Zombie Spawns - 100% Difficulty Increase With Each Wave - 100% Varigaunt - 100% (Will shoot electricity) (this version hasnt been uploaded yet) Level Change - 100% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet) Weapon Upgrades - 80% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet) Nukes 100% Graphics/Animation - 50% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet) Perks - 25% Sounds - 100% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet) Added Power and the Teleporter! 100%
[b]Image:[/b] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/zombie%20arcadium/screenshot101.png[/img] [IMG]http://i344.photobucket.com/albums/p348/tekidder_2008/zombie%20arcadium/screenshot100.png[/img]

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:15, topic:396634”]why does nobody flame on this game, and they do at your 3d zombie game?

i like this game + ur 3d zombie game, dont listen to the stupid fail flamers, 99.9% of them have no idea how to make a game -.-[/quote]
Also 99.9% of them dont use Game Maker.

Anyways, I think this was a smart move on your part to move back to 2d. The graphics were not very good in your 3d version lol. Ill be watching to see how this progresses. Who knows, after I finish my engines API I might test the strength by making a version of this.

Read full topic

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

I already started on grenades and blood splatter. Im also currently working on shells dropping from the gun when shot. It looks awesome so far. When I finish the new map I will be uploading the newest version.

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Nice, its getting better
Now heres a few things that could make it better

1: Zombies leave a blood texture when they die
2:Blood splatter effect when the zombie gets hit
3:Breakible objects
4:Grenades
5:Fog (as i stated earilyer)
6:Footprints? (would be nice)
7:Money (or spend points on guns)
8:Guns you can purchace.

Read full topic
item.source: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Those are really good ideas. The new version has been uploaded and is ready to play. There are now official graphics for all the zombie types. The Varigaunt looks awesome! there is now power which costs 5000 points to turn on and a teleporter that costs 1000 points to use. It will take you to a random spot on the map so it could save you, but it could also be the downfall of you!

Read full topic
item.source: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @shrogg shrogg
item.description:
@shrogg wrote:

Ok, here are a few things i suggest you adding
1: a “mist” around the player, so you dont know where every enemy is.
2: remove the balls, and add a death animation (make zombies?)
3: Randomly generated worlds? that would be cool, but not nessicary.
4: win conditions to go to the next round (500 kills?)

Read full topic
item.source: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Wow thanks I finished the Varigaunt and started making map 2. Its called the city. Now the scientists know that the universal gun works great against the zombies in a controlled environment they want to see it in action in the real world. So prepare to be plunged into a zombie apocalypse in the city…

Upcoming for map 2:
More weapon upgrades, bonus perks, and hidden features (these you must figure out. There will be 3)

Read full topic
item.source: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

GML Programmer:

Thanks everyone. I added some new stuff today. So far just power and a teleporter device. To turn on the power will cost 10,000 points and to use the teleporter you will need to have 5,000 points. I also made the zombies more like the ones on the actual DOA. Fixed the points for killing them and edited the difficulty a bit. I also DRASTICALLY changed the graphics. A little surprise for you all :D. Tonight im gonna start working on the Varigaunt and the main menu a bit as well as adding the story line somehow. Again thanks for all your support. Next update will be posted soon

Im going to download again because I spent like 2 hours playing it before. :3 once this gets farther along you should post it online so I can play it there too. xD

Read full topic
item.source: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)

A little surprise for you all :D. Tonight im gonna start working on the Varigaunt and the main menu a bit as well as adding the story line somehow. Again thanks for all your support. Next update will be posted soon

item.title: Zombie Arcadium v2.0.3.1 Open Source WIP (May 30th Update)
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

[size=14pt]Source Download v2.0.3.1: http://up.ht/mLPlim
Exe Download v2.0.3.1: http://up.ht/lkx9J3[/size]

Source Download v1.8.2.2: http://up.ht/jnPfxM
Exe. Download v1.8.2.2: http://up.ht/jDCRBK

[size=14pt]I DEFINATELY SUGGEST DOWNlOADING! EXTREMELY FUN!!![/size]

Story Line:
(Not yet included in the source) The scientists who created the downfall of man have created a new universal weapon. To test it they are sending you into a specalized test room where thay can filter how many zombies are let in. Be weary for they are also testing it on Varigaunts wich will appear every 5 waves… How long can you survive?

Introduction:
Zombie arcadium is a DOA(Dead Ops Arcade) inspired game. In zombie arcadium you are given a universal weapon in which can shoot 10 different types of bullets. Every 5 rounds when you kill the mighty Varigaunt a different weapon upgrade will drop. (So far there are only 2 upgrades but you will recieve nukes if you get the upgrade again.) As each wave progresses there are more and more zombies and they are harder to kill. What the game lacks in graphics at the moment is made up by game play.

Credits:
I am currently the only developer working on this
Sounds - CoD Zombies WAW
Graphics - Me & Unreal Software

Controlls:
WASD - Movement
Mouse - Aim
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Space - Pause
Shift - Nuke

Development Progress:
Zombie Spawns - 100%
Difficulty Increase With Each Wave - 100%
Varigaunt - 100% (Will shoot electricity) (this version hasnt been uploaded yet)
Level Change - 100% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet)
Weapon Upgrades - 80% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet)
Nukes 100%
Graphics/Animation - 50% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet)
Perks - 25%
Sounds - 100% (this version hasnt been uploaded yet)
Added Power and the Teleporter! 100%

Image:
